  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2150</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Magisk kvadrat</string>
            <string language="en">The Magic quadrangle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das magische Viereck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le quadrilatère magique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O quadrangle mágico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il quadrilatero magico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγικό quadrangle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cuadrilátero mágico</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Magiske kvadrater har samme sum langs alle radene og langs alle kolonnene. Klarer du å finne løsningen?</string>
            <string language="en">In a Magic quadrangle the rows and colums must have the same sum.Can you find the correct combinations?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">magisk kvadrat</string>
            <string language="en">magic quadrangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In einem magischen Viereck müssen die Reihen und 
die colums das gleiche sum.Can haben, das Sie die korrekten 
Kombinationen finden?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans un quadrilatère magique les lignes et les 
colums doivent avoir le même sum.Can que vous trouvez les 
combinaisons correctes ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em um quadrangle mágico as fileiras e os colums 
devem ter o mesmo sum.Can que você encontra as combinações 
corretas?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In un quadrilatero magico le file ed i colums 
devono avere lo stesso sum.Can che trovate le combinazioni corrette?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγικό quadrangle οι σειρές και colums πρέπει να 
έχουν το ίδιο ποσό μπορούν εσείς να βρούν τους σωστούς 
συνδυασμούς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿En un cuadrilátero mágico las filas y los 
colums deben tener el mismo sum.Can que usted encuentra las 
combinaciones correctas?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magisches Viereck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">quadrilatère magique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quadrangle mágico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quadrilatero magico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγικό quadrangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuadrilátero mágico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
